text: Anndee wonnde nguurndam aduna ɗam ko fijindaaru, e mbeleeɗe, e cuɗaari, e ɓurondiro hakkunde mon e jawle e ɓiɗɓe. Wano toɓo haawnungo remooɓe ɓen puɗi mun, refti ngo yoora, yi'aa hingo soyɗi; refti ngo wonta munciiɗum. Hino ka laakara, lette saɗtuɗe, e yaafuyee immorde e Allah e yarluyee. Nguurndam aduna ɗam wonaali, si wanaa dakammehoy hodo
